subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Greg Biffle and Clint Bowyer raced their way into the $1 million Nascar Sprint All-Star event, and Danica Patrick won the fan vote to complete the field for Saturday night’s race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C.
snippet: Greg Biffle and Clint Bowyer raced their way into the $1 million Nascar Sprint All-Star event, and Danica Patrick won the fan vote to complete the field for Saturday night’s race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C.
